          <title>
            <string language="en">The semaphore code</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Semaphorcode</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le code de sémaphore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O código do semaphore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il codice del semaphore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο κώδικας σηματοφόρων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El código del semáforo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a set of visual signals where two hand-held flags are used to send a message. This is called the semaphore code.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">communication</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hand-held flags</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hands</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">letter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">semaphore code</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">visual signals</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt ein Set Sichtsignale, in 
denen zwei Handmarkierungsfahnen benutzt werden, um eine Meldung zu 
senden. Dieses wird den Semaphorcode genannt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un ensemble de signaux 
visuels où deux indicateurs tenus dans la main sont employés pour 
envoyer un message. Ceci s'appelle le code de sémaphore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um jogo dos sinais 
visuais onde duas bandeiras hand-held são usadas emitir uma mensagem.
Isto é chamado o código do semaphore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un insieme dei segnali
visivi in cui due bandierine tenute in mano sono usate per trasmettere
un messaggio. Ciò è chiamata il codice del semaphore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ένα σύνολο οπτικών 
σημάτων όπου δύο φορητές σημαίες χρησιμοποιούνται για να 
στείλουν ένα μήνυμα. Αυτό καλείται κώδικα σηματοφόρων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un conjunto de las 
señales visuales donde dos indicadores hand-held se utilizan para 
enviar un mensaje. Esto se llama el código del semáforo.</string>
          </description>
